[docs]    def on_init(self):
        pygame.init()
        self._display_surf = pygame.display.set_mode(self.size, pygame.HWSURFACE | pygame.DOUBLEBUF)
        self._running = True

        #init dialing controller
        dialer = DialerController()



[docs]    def on_event(self, event):
        """
        On Event
        :param event: The event object
        """
        if event.type == pygame.QUIT:
            self._running = False

[docs]    def on_cleanup(self):

[docs]    def on_execute(self):
        if self.on_init() == False:
            self._running = False

        while( self._running ):
            for event in pygame.event.get():
                self.on_event(event)

            self.on_loop()
            self.on_render()

        self.on_cleanup()
